testcase.name: Donation
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the donation page.............................................passed When I click on the Okay! button............................................passed Then I click on the betrage text box and cleared it.........................passed And I type "5" into the betrage text box....................................passed Then I should select payment periode........................................passed And I should select payment method and see information message on the page..passed And Donation, company or individual payment method can be selected..........passed

testcase.name: DonationData_2
testcase.system-out: Given I click on the name box and type the "Testname".......................passed Then I click on the last box and type the "Testlasname".....................passed And I click on the email box and type the "test@betterplace.org"............passed Then I click on the Betrag anzeigen checkbox................................passed And I click on the Betrag Name anzeigen checkbox............................passed And I click on the Zu den Zahlungsinformationen button......................passed Then I should on the Weiter button..........................................passed And I should see the DANKE message..........................................passed
